name: College of Creation
description: Bards of the College of Creation believe the cosmos itself is a work of art. Through performance, they can shape reality, animate objects, and bring imagination to life.

3.name: Mote of Potential
3.description: When you grant Bardic Inspiration, you can also create a Mote of Potential that provides additional effects depending on how the die is used.

6.name: Animating Performance
6.description: As an action, you can animate a Large or smaller nonmagical object to fight alongside you for 1 hour.

10.name: Performance of Creation
10.description: As an action, you can create a nonmagical object of your choice within range, with size and gold value limits based on your level.

14.name: Creative Crescendo
14.description: You can use Performance of Creation multiple times at once, creating more than one object with a single performance.
